verses.verse: Of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Issachar: <S%H3485><s%> Tola, <S%H8439><s%> and Puah, <S%H6312><s%> Jashub, <S%H3437><s%> and Shimron, <S%H8110><s%> four. <S%H702><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Tola: <S%H8439><s%> Uzzi, <S%H5813><s%> and Rephaiah, <S%H7509><s%> and Jeriel, <S%H3400><s%> and Jahmai, <S%H3181><s%> and Ibsam, <S%H3005><s%> and Shemuel, <S%H8050><s%> heads <S%H7218><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses, <S%H1004><s%> of Tola; <S%H8439><s%> mighty <S%H2428><s%> men <S%H1368><s%> of valor in their generations: <S%H8435><s%> their number <S%H4557><s%> in the days <S%H3117><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> was twenty <S%H6242><s%> - two <S%H8147><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> hundred. <S%H3967><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Uzzi: <S%H5813><s%> Izrahiah. <S%H3156><s%> The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Izrahiah: <S%H3156><s%> Michael, <S%H4317><s%> and Obadiah, <S%H5662><s%> and Joel, <S%H3100><s%> Isshiah, <S%H3449><s%> five; <S%H2568><s%> all of them chief men. <S%H7218><s%>

With them, <S%H8435><s%> by their generations, after their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses, <S%H1004><s%> were bands <S%H1416><s%> of the army <S%H6635><s%> for war, <S%H4421><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> - six <S%H8337><s%> thousand; <S%H505><s%> for they had many <S%H7235><s%> wives <S%H802><s%> and sons. <S%H1121><s%>

Their brothers <S%H251><s%> among all the families <S%H4940><s%> of Issachar, <S%H3485><s%> mighty <S%H2428><s%> men of valor, <S%H1368><s%> reckoned in all by genealogy, <S%H3187><s%> were eighty <S%H8084><s%> - seven <S%H7651><s%> thousand. <S%H505><s%>
The sons of Benjamin: <S%H1144><s%> Bela, <S%H1106><s%> and Becher, <S%H1071><s%> and Jediael, <S%H3043><s%> three. <S%H7969><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Bela: <S%H1106><s%> Ezbon, <S%H675><s%> and Uzzi, <S%H5813><s%> and Uzziel, <S%H5816><s%> and Jerimoth, <S%H3406><s%> and Iri, <S%H5901><s%> five; <S%H2568><s%> heads <S%H7218><s%> of fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses, <S%H1004><s%> mighty <S%H1368><s%> men of valor; <S%H2428><s%> and they were reckoned by genealogy <S%H3187><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> - two <S%H8147><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> - four. <S%H702><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Becher: <S%H1071><s%> Zemirah, <S%H2160><s%> and Joash, <S%H3135><s%> and Eliezer, <S%H461><s%> and Elioenai, <S%H454><s%> and Omri, <S%H6018><s%> and Jeremoth, <S%H3406><s%> and Abijah, <S%H29><s%> and Anathoth, <S%H6068><s%> and Alemeth. <S%H5964><s%> All these were the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Becher. <S%H1071><s%>

They were reckoned <S%H3187><s%> by genealogy, <S%H8435><s%> after their generations, heads <S%H7218><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses, <S%H1004><s%> mighty men <S%H1368><s%> of valor, <S%H2428><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> two hundred. <S%H3967><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jediael: <S%H3043><s%> Bilhan. <S%H1092><s%> The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Bilhan: <S%H1092><s%> Jeush, <S%H3274><s%> and Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> and Ehud, <S%H164><s%> and Chenaanah, <S%H3668><s%> and Zethan, <S%H2133><s%> and Tarshish, <S%H8659><s%> and Ahishahar. <S%H300><s%>

All these were sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jediael, <S%H3043><s%> according to the heads <S%H7218><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>' households, <S%H1368><s%> mighty men of valor, <S%H2428><s%> seventeen <S%H7651><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and two hundred, <S%H3967><s%> who were able to go forth <S%H3318><s%> in the army <S%H6635><s%> for war. <S%H6635><s%>
Shuppim <S%H8206><s%> also, <S%H2650><s%> and Huppim, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ir, <S%H5893><s%> Hushim, <S%H2366><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aher. <S%H313><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Naphtali: <S%H5321><s%> Jahziel, <S%H3185><s%> and Guni, <S%H1476><s%> and Jezer, <S%H3337><s%> and Shallum, <S%H7967><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Bilhah. <S%H1090><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh: <S%H4519><s%> Asriel, <S%H844><s%> whom his concubine <S%H6370><s%> the Aramitess <S%H761><s%> bore: <S%H3205><s%> she bore <S%H3205><s%> Machir <S%H4353><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of Gilead: <S%H1568><s%>

and Machir <S%H4353><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%> of Huppim <S%H2650><s%> and Shuppim, <S%H8206><s%> whose sister <S%H269><s%>'s name <S%H8034><s%> was Maacah; <S%H4601><s%> and the name <S%H8034><s%> of the second <S%H8145><s%> was Zelophehad: <S%H6765><s%> and Zelophehad <S%H6765><s%> had daughters. <S%H1323><s%>

Maacah <S%H4601><s%> the wife <S%H802><s%> of Machir <S%H4353><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> a son, <S%H1121><s%> and she named <S%H8034><s%> him <S%H7121><s%> Peresh; <S%H6570><s%> and the name <S%H8034><s%> of his brother <S%H251><s%> was Sheresh; <S%H8329><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> were Ulam <S%H198><s%> and Rakem. <S%H7552><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ulam: <S%H198><s%> Bedan. <S%H917><s%> These were the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Machir, <S%H4353><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh. <S%H4519><s%>
His sister <S%H269><s%> Hammolecheth <S%H4447><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> Ishhod, <S%H379><s%> and Abiezer, <S%H44><s%> and Mahlah. <S%H4244><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shemida <S%H8061><s%> were Ahian, <S%H291><s%> and Shechem, <S%H7928><s%> and Likhi, <S%H3949><s%> and Aniam. <S%H593><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ephraim: <S%H669><s%> Shuthelah, <S%H7803><s%> and Bered <S%H1260><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> and Tahath <S%H8480><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> and Eleadah <S%H497><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> and Tahath <S%H8480><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%>

and Zabad <S%H2066><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> and Shuthelah <S%H7803><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> and Ezer, <S%H5827><s%> and Elead, <S%H496><s%> whom the men <S%H582><s%> of Gath <S%H1661><s%> who were born <S%H3205><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> killed, <S%H2026><s%> because they came down <S%H3381><s%> to take away <S%H3947><s%> their livestock. <S%H4735><s%>
Ephraim <S%H669><s%> their father <S%H1><s%> mourned <S%H56><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> and his brothers <S%H251><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to comfort him. <S%H5162><s%>

He went in <S%H935><s%> to his wife, <S%H802><s%> and she conceived, <S%H2029><s%> and bore <S%H3205><s%> a son, <S%H1121><s%> and he named <S%H8034><s%> him <S%H7121><s%> Beriah, <S%H1283><s%> because it went evil <S%H7451><s%> with his house. <S%H1004><s%>
His daughter <S%H1323><s%> was Sheerah, <S%H7609><s%> who built <S%H1129><s%> Beth Horon <S%H1032><s%> the lower <S%H8481><s%> and the upper, <S%H5945><s%> and Uzzen Sheerah. <S%H242><s%>
Rephah <S%H7506><s%> was his son, <S%H1121><s%> and Resheph, <S%H7566><s%> and Telah <S%H8520><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> and Tahan <S%H8465><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%>
Ladan <S%H3936><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Ammihud <S%H5989><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Elishama <S%H476><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%>
Nun <S%H5126><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> his son. <S%H1121><s%>

Their possessions <S%H272><s%> and habitations <S%H4186><s%> were Bethel <S%H1008><s%> and its towns, <S%H1323><s%> and eastward <S%H4217><s%> Naaran, <S%H5295><s%> and westward <S%H4628><s%> Gezer, <S%H1507><s%> with its towns; <S%H1323><s%> Shechem <S%H7927><s%> also and its towns, <S%H1323><s%> to Azzah <S%H5804><s%> and its towns; <S%H1323><s%>

and by the borders <S%H3027><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> Beth Shean <S%H1052><s%> and its towns, <S%H1323><s%> Taanach <S%H8590><s%> and its towns, <S%H1323><s%> Megiddo <S%H4023><s%> and its towns, <S%H1323><s%> Dor <S%H1756><s%> and its towns. <S%H1323><s%> In these lived <S%H3427><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Asher: <S%H836><s%> Imnah, <S%H3232><s%> and Ishvah, <S%H3438><s%> and Ishvi, <S%H3440><s%> and Beriah, <S%H1283><s%> and Serah <S%H8294><s%> their sister. <S%H269><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Beriah: <S%H1283><s%> Heber, <S%H2268><s%> and Malchiel, <S%H4439><s%> who was the father <S%H1><s%> of Birzaith. <S%H1269><s%>
Heber <S%H2268><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Japhlet, <S%H3310><s%> and Shomer, <S%H7763><s%> and Hotham, <S%H2369><s%> and Shua <S%H7774><s%> their sister. <S%H269><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Japhlet: <S%H3310><s%> Pasach, <S%H6457><s%> and Bimhal, <S%H1118><s%> and Ashvath. <S%H6220><s%> These are the children <S%H1121><s%> of Japhlet. <S%H3310><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shemer: <S%H8106><s%> Ahi, <S%H277><s%> and Rohgah, <S%H7303><s%> Jehubbah, <S%H3160><s%> and Aram. <S%H758><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Helem <S%H1987><s%> his brother: <S%H251><s%> Zophah, <S%H6690><s%> and Imna, <S%H3234><s%> and Shelesh, <S%H8028><s%> and Amal. <S%H6000><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zophah: <S%H6690><s%> Suah, <S%H5477><s%> and Harnepher, <S%H2774><s%> and Shual, <S%H7777><s%> and Beri, <S%H1275><s%> and Imrah, <S%H3236><s%>
Bezer, <S%H1221><s%> and Hod, <S%H1936><s%> and Shamma, <S%H8037><s%> and Shilshah, <S%H8030><s%> and Ithran, <S%H3506><s%> and Beera. <S%H878><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jether: <S%H3500><s%> Jephunneh, <S%H3312><s%> and Pispa, <S%H6462><s%> and Ara. <S%H690><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ulla: <S%H5925><s%> Arah, <S%H733><s%> and Hanniel, <S%H2592><s%> and Rizia. <S%H7525><s%>

All these were the children <S%H1121><s%> of Asher, <S%H836><s%> heads <S%H7218><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses, <S%H1004><s%> choice <S%H1305><s%> and mighty men <S%H1368><s%> of valor, <S%H2428><s%> chief <S%H7218><s%> of the princes. <S%H5387><s%> The number <S%H4557><s%> of them reckoned <S%H4557><s%> by genealogy <S%H3187><s%> for service in war <S%H6635><s%> was twenty <S%H6242><s%> - six <S%H8337><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> men. <S%H582><s%>
